attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ever since the war has been going on in palestine, old men, old wonem, children, mothers, fathers have died, in simple words its has been a catastrofy and its a shame that nobody has done anything about it. These humen beings are being killed left, right and center. we ask that this needs to stop, where is the justice, where is democtracy, where is freedom of speache if there is one. therefore this madness needs to stop and we urge that somthing is done about this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
